/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. A few trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the urban setting. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The overall composition of the image provides a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings, offering a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
